author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404. Modernization includes
* Move contents of plugin headers to source files
* Use thread-efficient EDModule base classes
* Use of `std::unique_ptr` instead of raw pointers
* Use of `Event::get()` instead of `Event::getByToken()` (not everywhere though)

Notable EDModules left to legacy (of which `TtFullLepKinSolutionProducer.` is being run in IB tests according to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404#issuecomment-988271610)
* `TtSemiEvtSolutionMaker`
  * Uses `TtSemiLRJetCombCalc` that uses `LRHelpFunctions` that calls `gStyle->Set...`. Migrating this would need domain knowledge.
* `TtHadEvtSolutionMaker`
  * Uses `TtHadLRJetCombCalc` that uses `LRHelpFunctions` (see above)
* `TtDilepEvtSolutionMaker`
  * Uses `TtHadEvtSolutionMaker` that calls `TF2::Eval()`. The `TF1::Eval()` can be made thread friendly if the `TF1` is not added to the global list of functions (see e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18636), but quickly I didn't see similar option for `TF2`.
* `TtFullLepKinSolutionProducer.`
  * Calls `TF2::Ecval()` (see above)

These are left to be followed up later (I'll probably open a new issue with the information above).

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.
title: Modernize most legacy EDModules in TopQuarkAnalysis package
